title: We are hiring for the role of Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to lead advertising campaigns for our clients
job_overview:
We are hiring for the role of Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to lead advertising campaigns for our clients.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on experience and results

Key duties:

Manage paid campaigns on Google Ads & Facebook Ads.

Provide strategic recommendations based on campaign performance.

Optimize for KPIs like ROAS, CTR, CPA.

Requirements:

1+ year experience running paid ads.

Strong analytical skills.

Comfortable working remotely.
